title: Five Minutes Longer
description: A monster or just a lonely man?Talon thought his life had ended when he transformed into an enhanced human.Reviled.Mistrusted.And often locked away.His one chance. Their one chance was to take up the crazy offer of being part of the new FBI unit, with one catch.Each enhanced had to partner a regular human, and no one wanted to work with them.Finn has battled all his life. His selfish mother, his Father's suicide, his brother's homophobia, and finally his dyslexia he thought ended his dreams of being in the FBI before they could even start.Finn thinks his biggest problem is the terrorist group that wants them all dead.He's wrong.His biggest problem is trying to work with a partner with lethal abilities who hates him on sightAnd never, ever, falling in love with him.   ***re-release 2020. Contains no significant story differences***
author: Victoria Sue
